hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Musa said:"The Messenger of Allah said: 'There are three who will be given a twofold reward: A man who has a slave woman whom he disciplines and disciplines her well, and teaches and teaches her well, then he manumits her and marries her; a slave who fulfills his duty toward Allah and toward his masters; and a believer from among the People of the Book

chapter.ara-name: باب عِتْقِ الرَّجُلِ جَارِيَتَهُ ثُمَّ يَتَزَوَّجُهَا .
chapter.eng-name: A Man Manumitting His Slave Woman, Then Marrying Her
